container.dark: vc-border vc-border-gray-900 rounded-lg vc-text-gray-200 vc-bg-gray-900 vc-shadow

navPopoverContainer.light: rounded-lg vc-text-sm vc-font-semibold vc-text-white vc-bg-gray-800 border vc-border-gray-700 vc-py-1 vc-shadow
navPopoverContainer.dark: rounded-lg vc-text-sm vc-font-semibold vc-text-gray-800 vc-bg-white border vc-border-gray-100 vc-py-1 vc-shadow

navTitle.light: vc-text-{color}-100 vc-font-bold hover:vc-bg-gray-900 vc-cursor-pointer vc-px-2 vc-py-1 rounded
navTitle.dark: vc-text-gray-900 vc-font-bold hover:vc-bg-gray-200 vc-cursor-pointer vc-px-2 vc-py-1 rounded

dayPopoverContainer.light: rounded vc-text-xs vc-text-white vc-font-medium vc-bg-gray-800 border vc-border-gray-700 vc-px-2 vc-py-1 vc-shadow
dayPopoverContainer.dark: rounded vc-text-xs vc-text-gray-900 vc-font-medium vc-bg-white border vc-border-gray-200 vc-px-2 vc-py-1 vc-shadow

datePickerInput: vc-shadow vc-appearance-none border rounded vc-w-full vc-py-2 vc-px-3 vc-text-gray-800 vc-bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:vc-shadow-outline
datePickerInputDrag: vc-shadow vc-appearance-none border rounded vc-w-full vc-py-2 vc-px-3 vc-text-gray-400 vc-bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:vc-shadow-outline
